outputs.output_descr:
THE NCSP achieves their objective by providing flexible and customized support based on countries needs. The overall support falls into three key Objectives:
Objective 1: To facilitate implementation of enabling activities related to preparation of the NCs. 
Objective 2: To prepare and disseminate technical and policy-relevant materials, including methodologies and tools. 
Objective 3: To enhance knowledge management, best practices, communication and outreach to decision makers.
